# part 0 aes
1. 用base64解碼數據
2. 填充密碼字節到32
3. 利用PyCryptodome建立一個AES.MODE_ECB的cipher物件
4. 用cipher物件解密題目

# part 1 rsa
1. 已知N = 84692954109552769374106613978990493265631425360379150170786955314741169348953
2. 利用yafu得出pq = 264515818482660146971535304176490802643*320181056072095218868339092717483179171
3. 計算r = 84692954109552769374106613978990493265046728485824394804947080917847195367140
4. 找到d = 42212724811763449831472184348135014762695139936058316009332078035025689864773
5. pow(c , d , n)
6. 用PyCryptodome把數字轉為字串

# part 2 hash
1. 在 https://hashes.com/en/decrypt/hash 搜尋 hashe
